controller
Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
  controller.ViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEventHandler, AnimationListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventHandler, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, AnimationListener

The ViewController for FrankTheTank. It handles events from the model and passes them on, adds and removes actors.

Author:
John Barbero Unenge
